original_text: In the days of Abiathar the high priest, he entered the house of God and ate the consecrated bread, which is lawful only for priests to eat. And he also gave some to his companions.”
korean_text: 그가 아비아달 대제사장 때에 하나님의 전에 들어가서 제사장 외에는 먹어서는 안 되는 진설병을 먹고 함께 한 자들에게도 주지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: In the days of Abiathar the high priest
he entered the house of God
which is lawful only for priests to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 제사장 외에는 먹지 못하는 것이었다

sentences.original_text: And he also gave some to his companions
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 함께 있던 자들에게도 주었다
